department: Acquisition PSIB of Office furniture CAT.06 SA E60PQ-140003
short_summary: Acquisition of office furniture (delivery and installation) for CSA St-Hubert
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of office furniture category 6 including delivery and installation. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
****************************
### Tender Announcement
#### Government of Canada
#### Solicitation Number: WS4224973631
#### Revision number of solicitation document: 1

##### Notice of Submission Opportunity
* **Classification**: RF722: Installation and repair services - Furniture; RF723: Installation and repair services - Office equipment; RF724: Install, test, adjust and repair furniture - office AMAE; RF725: Sanitation, maintenance and cleaning services AMAE
* **Identifier (Product or Service)**: Office furniture category 6
* **Current Contract Name: Acquisition PSAE de mobiliers de bureau CAT.06 sous AMA E60PQ-140003 pour ASC St-Hubert
* **Notice Type**: Request For Proposal (RFP) against an Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Industry**: Quebec (except NCR)

##### Solicitation Information
* **Submission Opportunity Closing Date**: 2023-10-04T14:00:00
* **Notice Date**: 2023-09-25
* **Revision Date**: 2023-09-28

##### Instructions for Preparing the Bid
The Principal Point of Contact is:
Aliquam Sawyer
